addonDescription.description: Description of the add-on, as it appears in the Add-ons list.
addonDescription.message: Umfasst das Fenster für Neue Nachrichten mit einem farbigen Rahmen, so dass Du die verschiedenen Identitäten unterscheiden kannst.

heading-color-selector.description: The heading above the list of identities, in the options

heading-style-selector.description: The heading above the list of styles, in the options

heading-size-selector.description: The heading above the list of style sizes, in the options
heading-size-selector.message: Wähle die Größe für den Effekt

style-all-sides.description: A border along all four sides of the composer

style-top-and-bottom.description: A border at the top and bottom of the composer

style-top.description: A border at the top of the composer

style-left-side-gradient.description: A gradient on the left side of the composer

style-background-top-right-gradient.description: A gradient in the top-right corner of the composer
style-background-top-right-gradient.message: Farbverlauf in der rechten, oberen Ecke

style-background-four-corners-gradient.description: A gradient in each corner of the composer

style-background-bottom-gradient.description: A gradient at the bottom of the composer

style-background.description: The color is applied to the whole background of the composer
